channel.title: The Lab: Exploring the mechanics of innovation on John Januszczak | Fintech & Innovation Strategy
channel.description: Recent content in The Lab: Exploring the mechanics of innovation on John Januszczak | Fintech & Innovation Strategy

item.title: Category vs Tag
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: An in-depth explanation of the differences and strategic uses of categories and tags, drawing parallels to taxonomies in content management systems.

item.title: The Evolution of Python Environment Management
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: A practitioner’s walkthrough of why Python suffers from dependency hell, how tools like virtualenv, pyenv, Poetry, and UV emerged to solve it, and what this evolution tells us about modern software ecosystems.
